Service Details: - Provides a range of health care and support services for eligible residents who have acute, chronic, palliative or rehabilitative health care needs- Services are designed to complement and supplement, but not replace the efforts of individuals to care for themselves with the assistance of family, friends and community- The range of services includes home based services such as assessment and case management, nursing, rehabilitation, home support and palliative care
Address & Map: Community Health & Services Centre505 Doyle AveKelowna, BC     V1Y 0C5View MapQuest Map
